events.name: Adobe Game Jam - Rishon Lezion 5 Dec & 6 Dec
events.about:
ADOBE® GAME JAM

Get in on the action - join Adobe® Game Jam to show off your game coding skills, have fun, and win some cool prizes! Youll meet like-minded people, get insights from our speakers and learn more about game design and development using Adobe Flash® technologies.

Wednesday, December 5, 2012 from 14:15 - 17:00

Preperation for Game Jam. Including setting up, forming teams and choosing topics.

Location

Cinema City
Shderot Moshe Dayan 32
Rishon Lezion

www.adobetraining.co.za/israel/map.pdf

Thursday, December 6, 2012 from 09:00-17:00

Start coding! Experts will be on hand to answer questions and help troubleshoot.

Location

Yes Planet 
VIP Floor 
4 One St 
Rishon Lezion

http://www.pointmail.co.za/adobe/2012/nov/adobe-game-jam/yprishonmap.pdf

Rules: http://gaming.adobe.com/events/gamejams/

Prizes: Prize value of up to $5,000

Requirements

  • You will need to bring your own equipment (laptop and/or devices ) to build and demo the game. (There will be limited set of devices available on-site for testing and presenting your game)
  • You should be somewhat familiar with programming in ActionScript 3.
  • To save time, either Flash Builder 4.7 beta (free download) or Flash Professional CS6(free 30-day trial available) are recommended to already be installed on your laptop before the Game Jame begins.
  • Wi-Fi will be provided
